a.xlink:title: When you heal HP, we will reset the lerped bar
Sets the current HP value to the Image.
Called whenever the player levels up.
This is triggered when the player respawns.
Initializes all the values into the Image and Text.
Initializes all the values and colors for this Player.
Initialize the actual Stats of the Player.
Function that implements what is done when this entity dies.
This starts all the initialization chain for the player.
